title: Ontario joins Quebec in seeking military aid for nursing homes - The Globe and Mail
description:

content:
A woman opens the door to a person in a wheelchair at Pinecrest Nursing Home after several residents died and dozens of staff were sickened due to coronavirus disease (COVID-19), in Bobcaygeon, Ontario, March 30, 2020.
CARLOS OSORIO/Reuters
